00026 #ifndef ED2KC2CTCP_H
00027 #define ED2KC2CTCP_H
00028 
00029 // Client <-> Client
00030 enum ED2KStandardClientTCP {    
00031     OP_HELLO                    = 0x01, // 0x10<HASH 16><ID 4><PORT 2><1 Tag_set>
00032     OP_SENDINGPART              = 0x46, // <HASH 16><von 4><bis 4><Daten len:(von-bis)>
00033     OP_REQUESTPARTS             = 0x47, // <HASH 16><von[3] 4*3><bis[3] 4*3>
00034     OP_FILEREQANSNOFIL          = 0x48, // <HASH 16>
00035     OP_END_OF_DOWNLOAD          = 0x49, // <HASH 16> // Unused for sending
00036     OP_ASKSHAREDFILES           = 0x4A, // (null)
00037     OP_ASKSHAREDFILESANSWER     = 0x4B, // <count 4>(<HASH 16><ID 4><PORT 2><1 Tag_set>)[count]
00038     OP_HELLOANSWER              = 0x4C, // <HASH 16><ID 4><PORT 2><1 Tag_set><SERVER_IP 4><SERVER_PORT 2>
00039     OP_CHANGE_CLIENT_ID         = 0x4D, // <ID_old 4><ID_new 4> // Unused for sending
00040     OP_MESSAGE                  = 0x4E, // <len 2><Message len>
00041     OP_SETREQFILEID             = 0x4F, // <HASH 16>
00042     OP_FILESTATUS               = 0x50, // <HASH 16><count 2><status(bit array) len:((count+7)/8)>
00043     OP_HASHSETREQUEST           = 0x51, // <HASH 16>
00044     OP_HASHSETANSWER            = 0x52, // <count 2><HASH[count] 16*count>
00045     OP_STARTUPLOADREQ           = 0x54, // <HASH 16>
00046     OP_ACCEPTUPLOADREQ          = 0x55, // (null)
00047     OP_CANCELTRANSFER           = 0x56, // (null)   
00048     OP_OUTOFPARTREQS            = 0x57, // (null)
00049     OP_REQUESTFILENAME          = 0x58, // <HASH 16>    (more correctly file_name_request)
00050     OP_REQFILENAMEANSWER        = 0x59, // <HASH 16><len 4><NAME len>
00051     OP_CHANGE_SLOT              = 0x5B, // <HASH 16> // Not used for sending
00052     OP_QUEUERANK                = 0x5C, // <wert  4> (slot index of the request) // Not used for sending
00053     OP_ASKSHAREDDIRS            = 0x5D, // (null)
00054     OP_ASKSHAREDFILESDIR        = 0x5E, // <len 2><Directory len>
00055     OP_ASKSHAREDDIRSANS         = 0x5F, // <count 4>(<len 2><Directory len>)[count]
00056     OP_ASKSHAREDFILESDIRANS     = 0x60, // <len 2><Directory len><count 4>(<HASH 16><ID 4><PORT 2><1 T
00057     OP_ASKSHAREDDENIEDANS       = 0x61  // (null)
00058 };
00059 
00060 // Extended prot client <-> Extended prot client
00061 enum ED2KExtendedClientTCP {
00062     OP_EMULEINFO                = 0x01, //
00063     OP_EMULEINFOANSWER          = 0x02, //
00064     OP_COMPRESSEDPART           = 0x40, //
00065     OP_QUEUERANKING             = 0x60, // <RANG 2>
00066     OP_FILEDESC                 = 0x61, // <len 2><NAME len>
00067     OP_VERIFYUPSREQ             = 0x71, // (never used)
00068     OP_VERIFYUPSANSWER          = 0x72, // (never used)
00069     OP_UDPVERIFYUPREQ           = 0x73, // (never used)
00070     OP_UDPVERIFYUPA             = 0x74, // (never used)
00071     OP_REQUESTSOURCES           = 0x81, // <HASH 16>
00072     OP_ANSWERSOURCES            = 0x82, //
00073     OP_REQUESTSOURCES2          = 0x83, // <HASH 16>
00074     OP_ANSWERSOURCES2           = 0x84, //  
00075     OP_PUBLICKEY                = 0x85, // <len 1><pubkey len>
00076     OP_SIGNATURE                = 0x86, // v1: <len 1><signature len>
00077                                         // v2:<len 1><signature len><sigIPused 1>
00078     OP_SECIDENTSTATE            = 0x87, // <state 1><rndchallenge 4>
00079     OP_REQUESTPREVIEW           = 0x90, // <HASH 16> // Never used for sending on aMule
00080     OP_PREVIEWANSWER            = 0x91, // <HASH 16><frames 1>{frames * <len 4><frame len>} // Never used for sending on aMule
00081     OP_MULTIPACKET              = 0x92,
00082     OP_MULTIPACKETANSWER        = 0x93,
00083 //  OP_PEERCACHE_QUERY          = 0x94, // Unused on aMule - no PeerCache
00084 //  OP_PEERCACHE_ANSWER         = 0x95, // Unused on aMule - no PeerCache
00085 //  OP_PEERCACHE_ACK            = 0x96, // Unused on aMule - no PeerCache
00086     OP_PUBLICIP_REQ             = 0x97,
00087     OP_PUBLICIP_ANSWER          = 0x98,
00088     OP_CALLBACK                 = 0x99, // <HASH 16><HASH 16><uint 16>
00089     OP_REASKCALLBACKTCP         = 0x9A,
00090     OP_AICHREQUEST              = 0x9B, // <HASH 16><uint16><HASH aichhashlen>
00091     OP_AICHANSWER               = 0x9C, // <HASH 16><uint16><HASH aichhashlen> <data>
00092     OP_AICHFILEHASHANS          = 0x9D,   
00093     OP_AICHFILEHASHREQ          = 0x9E,
00094     OP_BUDDYPING                = 0x9F,
00095     OP_BUDDYPONG                = 0xA0,
00096     OP_COMPRESSEDPART_I64       = 0xA1, // <HASH 16><von 8><size 4><Data len:size>
00097     OP_SENDINGPART_I64          = 0xA2, // <HASH 16><start 8><end 8><Data len:(end-start)>
00098     OP_REQUESTPARTS_I64         = 0xA3, // <HASH 16><start[3] 8*3><end[3] 8*3>
00099     OP_MULTIPACKET_EXT          = 0xA4, 
00100     OP_CHATCAPTCHAREQ           = 0xA5,
00101     OP_CHATCAPTCHARES           = 0xA6,
00102 };
00103 
00104 #endif // ED2KC2CTCP_H
